Input:
-Jackpot is a Coen Brothers-inspired take on homicidal greed and betrayal, Scandinavian-style
-When Christmas tree factory supervisor Oscar Svendsen wakes up terrified and bloody in a strip joint, with a shotgun in his hand and eight corpses surrounding him, he's clearly going to have a lot of explaining to do
-Under the intense interrogation of hard-boiled detective Solor, Oscar begins piecing together the unbelievable story of how he won the top prize in a soccer pool with his 3 dangerous ex-con colleagues
-With a pile of cash at stake, the trio enters into a vicious battle over how to divide the money, dragging unwitting Oscar along for the violent ride
-This rollicking gory romp racks up an impressive body count - and will keep you guessing until the very end
Output:
Get  ready for a wild ride with Jackpot, a Coen Brothers-inspired take on homicidal greed and betrayal, Scandinavian-style. When Christmas tree factory supervisor Oscar Svendsen wakes up terrified and bloody in a strip joint, with a shotgun in his hand and eight corpses surrounding him, he's clearly going to have a lot of explaining to do. 

Under the intense interrogation of hard-boiled detective Solor, Oscar begins piecing together the unbelievable story of how he won the top prize in a soccer pool with his 3 dangerous ex-con colleagues. With a pile of cash at stake, the trio enters into a vicious battle over how to divide the money, dragging unwitting Oscar along for the violent ride. This rollicking gory romp racks up an impressive body count - and will keep you guessing until the very end.

Input:
-Product Description: This filthy world its a beautiful place, isnt it? -- John Waters
-Dubbed "the Pope of Trash" and branded "O for Offensive" by the Catholic Church, filmmaker John Waters made his bad reputation by turning bad taste into high art.
-In THIS FILTHY WORLD, the writer-director of such cult classics as MULTIPLE MANIACS, PINK FLAMINGOS, POLYESTHER and HAIRSPRAY addresses a live theater audience in a hilarious and completely uncensored one-man-show.
-Part confession, part Vaudeville act, THIS FILTHY WORLD takes on such taboo topics as pedophilia, gay marriage and drug use while Waters waxes rhapsodic on the joys of saying inappropriate things to children.
-Directed by Jeff Garlin (CURB YOUR ENTHUSIASM, ARRESTED DEVELOPMENT), THIS FILTHY WORLD also features the exclusive ON THE ROAD featurette produced by David Gregory. Watch as John Waters sits down in his home and discusses his life and career.
-Bonus Features Include: John Waters Q and A John Waters: On The Road
Output:
With  THIS FILTHY WORLD, the writer-director of such cult classics as MULTIPLE MANIACS, PINK FLAMINGOS, POLYESTHER and HAIRSPRAY addresses a live theater audience in a hilarious and completely uncensored one-man-show. Part confession, part Vaudeville act, THIS FILTHY WORLD takes on such taboo topics as pedophilia, gay marriage and drug use while Waters waxes rhapsodic on the joys of saying inappropriate things to children. 

Directed by Jeff Garlin (CURB YOUR ENTHUSIASM, ARRESTED DEVELOPMENT), THIS FILTHY WORLD also features the exclusive ON THE ROAD featurette produced by David Gregory. Watch as John Waters sits down in his home and discusses his life and career. Bonus Features Include: John Waters Q and A John Waters: On The Road.

Input:
-Borderlands 3 Ultimate Edition is the quintessential Borderlands 3 experience, featuring the base game plus all 6 content add-ons and the full collection of bonus cosmetic packs!
-A MAYHEM-FUELED THRILL RIDE Stop the fanatical Calypso Twins from uniting the bandit clans and claiming the galaxys ultimate power.
-YOUR VAULT HUNTER, YOUR PLAYSTYLE Become one of four extraordinary Vault Hunters, each with unique abilities, playstyles, deep skill trees, and tons of personalization options.
-LOCK, LOAD, AND LOOT With bazillions of guns and gadgets, every fight is an opportunity to score new gear.
-NEW BORDERLANDS Discover new worlds beyond Pandora, each featuring unique environments to explore and enemies to destroy.
-QUICK & SEAMLESS CO-OP ACTION Play with anyone at any time online or in split-screen co-op, regardless of your level or mission progress.
Output:
The  Borderlands 3 Ultimate Edition is the perfect way to experience everything that this game has to offer. It includes the base game plus all 6 content add-ons and the full collection of bonus cosmetic packs. 

In Borderlands 3, you'll become one of four extraordinary Vault Hunters, each with unique abilities, playstyles, deep skill trees, and tons of personalization options. You'll need to use all of your skills to stop the fanatical Calypso Twins from uniting the bandit clans and claiming the galaxy's ultimate power. 

With bazillions of guns and gadgets at your disposal, every fight is an opportunity to score new gear. And with new worlds to explore beyond Pandora, you'll never run out of things to do. Quick and seamless co-op action makes it easy to play with anyone at any time online or in split-screen co-op, regardless of your level or mission progress. 

The Borderlands 3 Ultimate Edition is the ultimate way to experience everything this game has to offer. Don't miss out!

Input:
-Hand-painted and beautifully crafted, this iconic piece from Borderlands 2 is a must-have for any Borderlands fan!
-Handsome Jack was a maniacal villain whose mask will make a great trophy on your gaming wall!
-This Borderlands mask is crafted from a quality resin material. With a 7-inch height it is certain to make a statement in your home, man-cave, or video game room!
-True to the Borderlands series, this video game art piece has been painted in tune with the art style of Borderlands. Thick detail lines and washed out colors bring the mask to life!
-If you're looking to complete your gaming decor or you're simply an avid Borderlands collector, you'll want this treasure of Pandora for your wall.
-President of the Hyperion Corporation and anti-hero in Borderlands 2, Handsome Jack was convinced by his own delusions that he was everyones everyman. He was led on by the illusion of this concept to the point that he would do anything in his power to manipulate things to be the way he wanted them to be. This is what led to his villainy. This also explains why he would feel the need to wear his iconic mask. Now that Jack is gone, you can claim his mask for yourself.
-This hand painted and framed mask is the perfect addition to anyones borderland collection. Permanently affixed to the shadow box frame, this mask would look beautiful in any vault hunters home.
Output:
Get  your very own Handsome Jack Mask from Borderlands 2! This iconic piece is hand-painted and beautifully crafted, making it a must-have for any Borderlands fan. With a 7-inch height, it is certain to make a statement in your home, man-cave, or video game room! 

True to the Borderlands series, this video game art piece has been painted in tune with the art style of Borderlands. Thick detail lines and washed out colors bring the mask to life! If you're looking to complete your gaming decor or you're simply an avid Borderlands collector, you'll want this treasure of Pandora for your wall.

Input:
-The Zombie Island of Dr. Ned and Mad Moxxi's Underdome Riot are the first two digital download add-on content packs released for Borderlands
-The Zombie Island of Dr. Ned is focused on the town and surrounding areas of Jacob's Cove, which is on the fictional Jakobs Corporation owned Island unofficially named Zombie Island
-In Mad Moxxi's Underdome Riot, action occurs within a series of spaces known as riot arenas where the changing rules, commentary and mood are provided entirely at the whim of the over-the-top and seductive ringmistress, Moxxi
-Unlike earlier content releases for Borderlands, Mad Moxxi's Underdome Riot allows for co-op functionality which both ratchets up the fun and increases players chances of success as the competition rises in later rounds
Output:
With  the Zombie Island of Dr. Ned and Mad Moxxi's Underdome Riot digital download add-on content packs for Borderlands, you'll be able to enjoy hours of fun and excitement. In Zombie Island of Dr. Ned, you'll focus on the town and surrounding areas of Jacob's Cove, which is on the fictional Jakobs Corporation owned Island unofficially named Zombie Island. In Mad Moxxi's Underdome Riot, action occurs within a series of spaces known as riot arenas where the changing rules, commentary and mood are provided entirely at the whim of the over-the-top and seductive ringmistress, Moxxi. 

Unlike earlier content releases for Borderlands, Mad Moxxi's Underdome Riot allows for co-op functionality which both ratchets up the fun and increases players chances of success as the competition rises in later rounds. With these two digital download add-on content packs, you'll be sure to have a blast!

Input:
-Our heavy duty decorative iron nails are designed to be the perfect metal accents for your diy project.
-They are super easy to install, and will not break or bend like other furniture tacks for wood.
-The black finish of our button nails is designed for exterior uses like shutters & gates.
-Our decorative nail tacks are the only decorative nails for wood that have an undercoating for rust resistance
-Our nail head tacks are a great fit for woodworking home improvement projects - wood shutters exterior, barn door hardware, antique treasure chest hardware, wooden garages gate hardware & furniture.
-We recommend you predrill a pilot hole and use a rubber mallet when you hammer in our black tacks.
-The nail shanks of our door nail heads are the right length to use on decorative shutter hardware.
-Using our hardware is an easy way to take your project to the next level.
-We hand make our nails which gives them a rich character that can enhance the overall quality of your woodworking project.
Output:
With  these heavy duty decorative iron nails from Antner, your diy project will be taken to the next level. They are super easy to install, and will not break or bend like other furniture tacks for wood. The black finish of our button nails is designed for exterior uses like shutters & gates. 

Our decorative nail tacks are the only decorative nails for wood that have an undercoating for rust resistance. Our nail head tacks are a great fit for woodworking home improvement projects - wood shutters exterior, barn door hardware, antique treasure chest hardware, wooden garages gate hardware & furniture. 

We recommend you predrill a pilot hole and use a rubber mallet when you hammer in our black tacks. The nail shanks of our door nail heads are the right length to use on decorative shutter hardware. Using our hardware is an easy way to take your project to the next level. We hand make our nails which gives them a rich character that can enhance the overall quality of your woodworking project.

Input:
-Tina decided to make her own board game after the fall of Handsome Jack
-She started by tearing apart and jamming back together ACTUAL Claptrap units, but the sounds of their protests and complaints got a bit annoying
-After consulting Princess Fluffybutt and Sir Reginald she opted for a card game instead
-In the game, players will enlist some help from Brick, Mordecai, Moxxi and Earl to mess with your opponents and find what you need to win
-Featuring brand new original art and character designs never seen anywhere else; Borderlands: Tiny Tinas Robot Tea Party is the first wide release tabletop game ever set in the Borderlands universe
-Its made to be the perfect filler game, with dead simple rules, a quick play time and plenty of interaction
-This officially licensed product is a collaboration of Nerdvana Games, Gearbox Software and XYZ Game Labs
Output:
With  the Borderlands: Tiny Tina's Robot Tea Party card game, players will enlist some help from Brick, Mordecai, Moxxi and Earl to mess with your opponents and find what you need to win. Featuring brand new original art and character designs never seen anywhere else, this officially licensed product is a collaboration of Nerdvana Games, Gearbox Software and XYZ Game Labs. 

The game is made to be the perfect filler game, with dead simple rules, a quick play time and plenty of interaction. So gather your friends, grab some snacks and get ready to have some fun!

Input:
-Revisit Pandora in two new campaigns: "Captain Scarlett and Her Pirate's Booty" and "Mr. Torgue's Campaign of Carnage"
-Play as a fifth character: Gaige, the Mechromancer
-Fight challenging enemies in the Creature Slaughter Dome battle arena and earn Mad Moxxi's rare rocket launcher
-Unlock unique weapons including the Gearbox Gun Pack and Skyrocket Grenade, and receive a Golden Key to unlock rare loot from the golden chest in Sanctuary
-Customize each character with additional heads and skins
Output:
This  Borderlands 2 Game of the Year Edition includes all the DLC released to date, plus a few extra goodies. In the "Captain Scarlett and Her Pirate's Booty" campaign, players will search for the lost treasure of the notorious pirate queen. In "Mr. Torgue's Campaign of Carnage," players are tasked with blowing up as many things as possible. 

Players can also choose to play as Gaige, the Mechromancer, a fifth character who can summon a robotic sidekick. In addition, they'll face challenging enemies in the Creature Slaughter Dome battle arena and earn Mad Moxxi's rare rocket launcher. 

This edition also includes unique weapons like the Gearbox Gun Pack and Skyrocket Grenade, and a Golden Key to unlock rare loot from the golden chest in Sanctuary. Plus, each character can be customized with additional heads and skins.

Input:
-The Borderlands Legendary Collection includes Borderlands: Game of the Year Edition, Borderlands 2, and Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel, plus loads of bonus add-on content for all three games with more than 100 additional hours of gameplay
-Commander Lilith & the Fight for Sanctuary is not included
-Enjoy all three games on the go, locally as a 2-player split-screen co-op or online with up to four players
- Borderlands: Game of the Year Edition - Discover the co-op shooter-looter that started it all, stuffed with enhancements and packed with content
-Load up on four unique Vault Hunters, each with their own skills and abilities, and explore the lawless planet of Pandora in search of powerful alien technology: the Vault
-Borderlands 2 - Play as one of six Vault Hunters, each with their own skills and abilities, as you attempt to take down Handsome Jack, the villain of Borderlands 2
-Find new friends, arm them with a bazillion weapons and fight alongside them in a relentless quest for revenge and redemption across an undiscovered and unpredictable planet
-Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel - Explore the story of Handsome Jack, the villain of Borderlands 2, and his rise to power
-The Pre-Sequel takes place between the events of the original Borderlands and Borderlands 2 and features a ton of new gameplay and features for the genre-defining co-op shooter-looter hybrid that fans love
-Get triple the loot, triple the action, and triple the fun with the Borderlands Legendary Collection
Output:
The  Borderlands Legendary Collection includes Borderlands: Game of the Year Edition, Borderlands 2, and Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel, plus loads of bonus add-on content for all three games with more than 100 additional hours of gameplay. Commander Lilith & the Fight for Sanctuary is not included. 

Enjoy all three games on the go, locally as a 2-player split-screen co-op or online with up to four players. 

Borderlands: Game of the Year Edition - Discover the co-op shooter-looter that started it all, stuffed with enhancements and packed with content. Load up on four unique Vault Hunters, each with their own skills and abilities, and explore the lawless planet of Pandora in search of powerful alien technology: the Vault. 

Borderlands 2 - Play as one of six Vault Hunters, each with their own skills and abilities, as you attempt to take down Handsome Jack, the villain of Borderlands 2. Find new friends, arm them with a bazillion weapons and fight alongside them in a relentless quest for revenge and redemption across an undiscovered and unpredictable planet. 

Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel - Explore the story of Handsome Jack, the villain of Borderlands 2, and his rise to power. The Pre-Sequel takes place between the events of the original Borderlands and Borderlands 2 and features a ton of new gameplay and features for the genre-defining co-op shooter-looter hybrid that fans love. 

Get triple the loot, triple the action, and triple the fun with the Borderlands Legendary Collection.

-Vehicular combat is a feature of the game
-The story is set on the planet Pandora which is rich in untapped mineral wealth

Vehicular combat is a feature of the game, and the story is set on the planet Pandora which is rich in untapped mineral wealth. The game features literally thousands of different types of weapons, so you're sure to find the perfect one for your playstyle.

This  new DLC for Borderlands 2, "Moons of Pandora", offers a space-based twist on the popular game. With new weapons equipped with ice and laser capabilities, and new enemies to fight, you'll have your work cut out for you. But it's not all doom and gloom  you'll also get to witness Handsome Jack's rise to power and dive deep into the origins of iconic Borderlands villains. 

Turn the tables and experience Handsome Jack's side of the story for the first time ever. Play as one of four new character classes, including Wilhelm the Enforcer, Nisha the Lawbringer, and Athena the Gladiator. Or, play as a combat-ready Claptrap prototype for the first time. Experience the gray morality of working alongside Handsome Jack in this exciting new addition to the Borderlands 2 universe!

Input:

-Lonely are the Brave is an unforgettable portrait of a lawless man defying life in an orderly world.
Output:
The  Kirk Douglas classic, Lonely are the Brave, is a must-watch. Douglas won an Academy Award for his role as a cowboy on a collision course with the modern world. Jack Burns (Douglas) finds himself alone and on the run from the law, with Sheriff Morey Johnson (Walter Matthau) leading the manhunt. Despite his own sympathy for the fugitive, Johnson must bring Burns to justice. 

Lonely are the Brave is an unforgettable portrait of a lawless man defying life in an orderly world. Don't miss it!

Input:
-The Bronte sisters comprise one of the world's most famous literary families
-Charlotte, the eldest, published Jane Eyre, the quintessential gothic romance in 1847
-Later that year Emily brought forth Wuthering Heights, which has haunted generations of readers for more than two centuries
-Anne Bronte's The Tenant of Wildfell Hall was published in 1848
-The 1996 BBC adaptation of Anne Bronte's moral tale The Tenant of Wildfell Hall will be a delight to those who revel in classics brought to the screen
-Ian McShane is mesmerizing in this 1967 BBC version of Wuthering Heights
-The acting is uniformly splendid, though it's McShane who steals the show
-The scenery and costumes of this period piece are lush
-The plot really starts rolling when Jane takes a position as governess at Thornfield, a handsome estate owned by the imperious and tortured Mr. Rochester
Output:
The  Bronte sisters comprise one of the world's most famous literary families. Charlotte, the eldest, published Jane Eyre, the quintessential gothic romance in 1847. Later that year Emily brought forth Wuthering Heights, which has haunted generations of readers for more than two centuries. Anne Bronte's The Tenant of Wildfell Hall was published in 1848. 

The 1996 BBC adaptation of Anne Bronte's moral tale The Tenant of Wildfell Hall will be a delight to those who revel in classics brought to the screen. Ian McShane is mesmerizing in this 1967 BBC version of Wuthering Heights. The acting is uniformly splendid, though it's McShane who steals the show. The scenery and costumes of this period piece are lush. 

The plot really starts rolling when Jane takes a position as governess at Thornfield, a handsome estate owned by the imperious and tortured Mr. Rochester.

Input:
-Dubbed "the Pope of Trash" and branded "O for Offensive" by the Catholic Church, filmmaker John Waters made his bad reputation by turning bad taste into high art
-In THIS FILTHY WORLD, the writer-director of such cult classics as MULTIPLE MANIACS, PINK FLAMINGOS, POLYESTHER and HAIRSPRAY addresses a live theater audience in a hilarious and completely uncensored one-man-show
-Part confession, part Vaudeville act, THIS FILTHY WORLD takes on such taboo topics as pedophilia, gay marriage and drug use while Waters waxes rhapsodic on the joys of saying inappropriate things to children
-Directed by Jeff Garlin (CURB YOUR ENTHUSIASM, ARRESTED DEVELOPMENT), THIS FILTHY WORLD also features the exclusive ON THE ROAD featurette produced by David Gregory
-Watch as John Waters sits down in his home and discusses his life and career
-Bonus Features Include: John Waters Q and A John Waters: On The Road
Output:
The  "Pope of Trash" and "O for Offensive" filmmaker John Waters is back with his latest film, THIS FILTHY WORLD. In this hilariously uncensored one-man-show, Waters addresses a live theater audience on such taboo topics as pedophilia, gay marriage, and drug use. Part confession, part Vaudeville act, THIS FILTHY WORLD is a must-see for fans of the cult classic films MULTIPLE MANIACS, PINK FLAMINGOS, POLYESTHER, and HAIRSPRAY. 

Directed by Jeff Garlin (CURB YOUR ENTHUSIASM, ARRESTED DEVELOPMENT), THIS FILTHY WORLD also features the exclusive ON THE ROAD featurette produced by David Gregory. Watch as John Waters sits down in his home and discusses his life and career. Bonus features include a John Waters Q and A and John Waters: On The Road.

The set includes a coin folder with six coins from the San Francisco and Denver Mints, a penny planchet (coin blank), and a Mighty Minter magnifying glass. The folder has four quarter-sized openings for kids to collect the other four America the Beautiful Quarters released in 2019. Don't miss out on this adventure of a lifetime!

-Bonus Features Include: John Waters Q and A John Waters: On The Road Review
Output:
This  Filthy World is a hilarious and completely uncensored one-man-show by John Waters, the pope of trash. He made his bad reputation by turning bad taste into high art, and in this show he takes on such taboo topics as pedophilia, gay marriage, and drug use while waxing rhapsodic on the joys of saying inappropriate things to children. 

Directed by Jeff Garlin (CURB YOUR ENTHUSIASM, ARRESTED DEVELOPMENT), this movie also features the exclusive ON THE ROAD featurette produced by David Gregory. Watch as John Waters sits down in his home and discusses his life and career. Bonus features include: John Waters Q and A and John Waters: On The Road Review.

In THIS FILTHY WORLD, the writer-director of such cult classics as MULTIPLE MANIACS, PINK FLAMINGOS, POLYESTHER and HAIRSPRAY addresses a live theater audience in a hilarious and completely uncensored one-man-show. Part confession, part Vaudeville act, THIS FILTHY WORLD takes on such taboo topics as pedophilia, gay marriage and drug use while Waters waxes rhapsodic on the joys of saying inappropriate things to children. Directed by Jeff Garlin (CURB YOUR ENTHUSIASM, ARRESTED DEVELOPMENT), THIS FILTHY WORLD also features the exclusive ON THE ROAD featurette produced by David Gregory. Watch as John Waters sits down in his home and discusses his life and career. -Detouring from the pre-boxed, mass produced romantic gift, this journal is sure to bless and encourage whoever receives it

Output:
With  Jackpot, you'll be on the edge of your seat until the very end! This rollicking gory romp racks up an impressive body count and is sure to keep you guessing.Inspired by the Coen Brothers, Jackpot is a Scandinavian-style take on homicidal greed and betrayal. When Christmas tree factory supervisor Oscar Svendsen wakes up terrified and bloody in a strip joint, with a shotgun in his hand and eight corpses surrounding him, he's clearly got some explaining to do. 

Under the intense interrogation of hard-boiled detective Solor, Oscar begins piecing together the unbelievable story of how he won the top prize in a soccer pool with his 3 dangerous ex-con colleagues. With a pile of cash at stake, the trio enters into a vicious battle over how to divide the money, dragging unwitting Oscar along for the violent ride. You won't be able to put this book down!
